courses.description: Start your DSA journey with CPP taught by expert instructors.

courses.title: HTML & CSS

courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the core concepts of JavaScript, including variables, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation, to build dynamic and interactive web applications.

courses.title: Advance JavaScript
courses.description: Master advanced JavaScript concepts such as asynchronous programming, closures, prototypes, and ES6+ features to build efficient and scalable applications.

courses.description: Become a React.js expert by mastering advanced concepts like hooks, context, performance optimization, and state management with Redux or Zustand.

courses.title: Backend Mastery
courses.description: Master backend development by learning advanced concepts like RESTful APIs, authentication, database design, and scalable architectures.

courses.title: NextJS Mastery
courses.description: Master Next.js by learning advanced features like server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), API routes, and dynamic routing.
